text: Bashi is an unincorporated community in Clarke County, Alabama, United States. It takes its name from the nearby Bashi Creek that flows westward into the Tombigbee River. ==Geography== Bashi is located at at an elevation of . Bashi is in the Central Time Zone.http://roadsidethoughts.com/al/bashi-xx-clarke- summary.htm ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Alabama Category:Unincorporated communities in Clarke County, Alabama
title: Bashi, Alabama
